register_face: Frontal view - facing directly at camera
Neutral expression - no smiling, frowning, or exaggerated expressions
Eyes open - both eyes clearly visible
No obstructions - no glasses, hats, masks, or hair covering face
Good lighting - even lighting, no shadows on face
No side profiles - must be frontal view
No group photos - single person only
No extreme angles - face should be upright
detect_face: Minimum face size: 100x100 pixels in the image
Maximum faces: System can detect up to 50 faces per image
Multiple matches: Only the best match is considered
